Literature.Title: Novel antimicrobial peptides isolated from the skin secretions of Hainan odorous frog, Odorrana hainanensis.
Literature.Author: Wang H, Yu Z, Hu Y, Li F, Liu L, Zheng H, Meng H, Yang S, Yang X, Liu J

Sequence Information.Target Organism: Enterococcus faecium 091299(MIC=19µM),Enterococcus faecalis 981(MIC=19µM),Staphylococcus aureus ATCC 25923(MIC=1.2µM),Staphylococcus carnosus KHS(MIC=4.8µM),Bacillus licheniformis X39(MIC=2.4µM),Rhodococcus rhodochrous X15(MIC=1.2µM),Salmonella enterica subsp. enterica serovar Typhi(no activity data),Pseudomonas aeruginosa ATCC 27853(no activity data),Escherichia coli ATCC 25922(MIC=150µM),Psychrobacter faecalis X29(MIC=4.8µM),Slime mold 090223(MIC=1.2µM),Candida albicans ATCC 2002(MIC=2.4µM)
